intro: Ballota disticha, commonly known as the common ballota, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. Ballota disticha is typically found in rocky soils and is adapted to dry, sunny environments.
